name: Pegcozy
description:
A (hopefully) fun twist on Peggle.

Experiment with combining upgrades to maximise your highscore! Or just have fun with clearing the maps and getting all the coins.

Our initial vision included a little witch cleaning her fireplace for winter. We got a little lost in adding all the mechanics to the game, but hope we can bring you a joyful experience.

We tried to make the game feel homely and cozy, while making all assets ourselves and using only the given palette. The entire game takes place in one room.

The game obviously is inspired by Peggle and Peglin, both very cute games.

Credits:

Programming: Steffen Schlosser, Sükrü Turhal

Design: Steffen Schlosser, Leonard Schüßler, Sükrü Turhal
